ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a fruit dip that's very easy! Blend your favorite yogurt flavor with frozen whipped topping and dip! I use slices of Granny Smith, Golden and Red delicious apples, white & red grapes, orange sections, strawberries, kiwi fruit and pineapple chunks for a platter. "
ins: In a medium bowl, blend the whipped topping and yogurt. Chill in the refrigerator 30 minutes before serving.
